feed.title: Mount Carleton (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Mount Carleton (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday: Cloudy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Fog patches dissipating early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers late this evening and after midnight with risk of freezing rain. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 2 mm. High 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 30 December 2022
